Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI feedback provided an in depth analysis of work, whereas teacher feedback was surface level suggesting they did not really participate in looking over my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI forced me to be better to opt for a better result and grade, not affecting my emotions at all. However, feedback from teachers has stressed me and sometimes feel like my work is not good enough.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Usually GenAi can provide an immediate analysis whereas teachers may take some time for feedback.
